abstract.p: Photos of cars and fashions at Louis Vuitton Classic, show of antique autos in Rockefeller Center

block.p: For four days, the streets of Rockefeller Center were covered in gray carpeting for the second annual Louis Vuitton Classic, a display of 49 exotic antique passenger cars and racing cars. Early in the century, the automobile show ranked with the horse show and opera events that opened the social and fashion season.

Last year, Louis Vuitton, the Paris maker of luxury leather goods, revived the high-society automobile show here, and this year the show continued to attract a stylish audience in custom-fitted Harris tweed or suede jackets with leather pants worn with designer scarves and handbags. Even the children wore classic styles.
